text: House of Anubis is a mystery television series. It was created by Hans Bourlon and Gert Verhulst and premiered on Nickelodeon on 1 January 2011 in the United States and on 25 February 2011 in the United Kingdom. It is the first series from the network to be filmed outside the United States and the first telenovela-format series for the network. The series aired from 1 January 2011 to 17 June 2013.
